com.google.android.drdat.cl.PasswordEncoder

PasswordEncoder Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Utility to make md5 hashes with a string input.

Note the original is in error and sometimes returned words that are missing leading zeros. This bug has been fixed.

See also:
http://workbench.cadenhead.org/news/1428/creating-md5-hashed-passwords-java}
